page400.title: Bad request
page400.heading: Bad request
page400.message: The server could not understand the request.

page401.title: Unauthorized
page401.heading: Unauthorized
page401.message: You are not authorized to view this page.

page403.title: Forbidden
page403.heading: Session timeout
page403.message: Your session has timed-out; please try again.

page404.title: Page not found
page404.heading: Page not found
page404.message: The page you are looking for does not exist.

page500.title: Server error
page500.heading: Server error
page500.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
page500.deadlockMessage: Another user was busy with the data you want to use. Please try again.

general.contactSupport: If the problem persists, please contact support.
